## Packages

```{r}
required_packages <- c("tidyverse")

for (pkg in required_packages) {
  if (!pkg %in% required_packages) {
    install.packages(required_packages)
  }
  library(required_packages, character.only = TRUE)
}

rm(pkg)
```
